text: Manuel Heitor (born 1958) is a Portuguese politician serving as Minister of Science, Technology and Higher Education . Heitor graduated with a PhD in mechanical engineering from Imperial College London, and did a post-doctoral at the University of California, San Diego. From March 2005 to June 2011, Heitor served as the Secretary of State for Science, Technology and Higher Education. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Portugal Category:People from Lisbon
title: Manuel Heitor
